page.title: 04Farming in the Bodenham area
page.content: Ash Grove Farm and Woodhouse Farm are in the Bodenham area. Millcroft Farm,14 acres,owned by Mrs Rogers. 2 workers.1 person lives on the premises.There are 4 buildings, dating back 300 years. She grows hay, fruit, and keeps cattle. Brockington Hall, 27 acres, owned by Mr Powell. 1 worker.2 live on the premises.There are 4 buildings about 50 years old. He grows wheat and keeps cattle. Red Barn, 60 acres, owned by Mr P Sayse. 1 worker. 2 live on the premises.The four buildings date back 400 years. He keeps pigs, sheep, cattle, and grows hay and silage.
